Date Pickers

Date pickers allow users to select a single date or a range of dates from a calendar popover when clicking into the field.

Examples

${require('html-loader?interpolate!../../partials/toggles.html')}

Single Date Picker

Range Date Picker

Single Date Picker (Allow Input)

Ex. dd-mmm-yyyy

This option requires the user to input the date in the exact input required. There should be helper text below the input if this option is selected.

Guidelines

  • Always use the calendar icon inside the input box.
  • Always use the DD-MMM-YYYY date formatting standard (ex. 10-Dec-2019).
  • “DD-MMM-YY” helper text within the field is only necessary if enabling keyboard input.
  • Prepopulate dates only if you are certain users are likely to choose those dates.

Documentation

Modifiers

Class Description
.uxf-date-picker-time add class to .uxf-date-picker element to include time
.uxf-date-picker-range add class to .uxf-date-picker element to use range of dates

Javascript

Datepickers use the Flatpickr library included in UXFrame Plus.

Convert from UXFrame v1 to v2

  1. Add .uxf-jquery-ui to the .uxf containing element
